title: UX Audit & Accessibility Redesign
description: Conduct a UX accessibility audit and propose a redesign of the client dashboard in compliance with WCAG standards.
notes: Focus on color contrast, keyboard navigation, and screen reader compatibility.

title: Motion Graphics Video for Healthcare App
description: Create a 90-second animated video explaining features of Corlax's iOS wellness app.
notes: Maintain a calm, clean visual aesthetic aligned with healthtech branding.

title: Festival Social Media Campaign Strategy

title: AI Voice Dataset Annotation
description: Manually annotate voice datasets for training speech models for multiple accents.
notes: Accent accuracy and timestamp precision are critical.

title: Interactive Park Map Web App
description: Build an interactive web app for visualizing Lagos park layouts with routes, amenities, and accessibility features.
notes: Mobile-first experience is a priority. Use open-source map APIs where possible.
